def_cn: （向敌人进攻之方式）同归于尽的，自杀性的
def_en: If someone such as a soldier or terrorist performs a kamikaze act, they attack the enemy knowing that they will be killed doing it.

def_cn: （行动或态度）冒死的，不要命的
def_en: You can use kamikaze to describe an action or attitude which involves doing something which is very dangerous and likely to harm the person who does it.
